name: vega-view
description: View component and transforms for Vega visualizations.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,d3-color:d3,d3-format:d3,d3-time-format:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-runtime:vega,vega-scenegraph:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-view.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-view.js -c -m -o build/vega-view.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-view.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-view.js build/vega-view.min.js
